name: VAMPIRE NIGHTBRINGER
size_type_alignment: Medium or Small Undead, Neutral Evil

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.text: The vampire takes 10 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vampire makes one Bite attack and one Shadow Strike attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Shadow Strike
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Cold damage.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.text: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the vampire takes the Hide action.
